quiz.question: phoenix ______
quiz.explanation: 凤凰; 不死鸟, 凤凰涅槃. The company was like a phoenix rising from bankruptcy. 公司就像从破产中凤凰涅槃。

quiz.question: _______ paradox
quiz.explanation: 悖论; 矛盾, 逻辑悖论. The statement presents a logical paradox. 这个陈述提出了一个逻辑悖论。

quiz.question: orthodox ______
quiz.explanation: 正统的; 传统的, 正统信仰. He follows orthodox belief in his religion. 他遵循宗教中的正统信仰。

quiz.question: heterodox _____
quiz.explanation: 异端的; 非正统的, 异端观点. The philosopher held heterodox views on theology. 哲学家对神学持有异端观点。

quiz.question: outfox _ _____
quiz.explanation: 以智取胜; 智胜, 智胜对手. The clever lawyer managed to outfox a rival. 聪明的律师设法智胜对手。

quiz.question: ________ flux
quiz.explanation: 流动; 变化, 不断的变化. The market is in constant flux. 市场处于不断的变化中。

quiz.question: __ influx __ ________
quiz.explanation: 涌入; 流入, 游客涌入. The city experienced an influx of tourists. 这座城市经历了游客涌入。

quiz.question: ___ crux __ ______
quiz.explanation: 关键; 症结, 问题的关键. That's the crux of matter we're discussing. 那是我们正在讨论的问题的关键。

quiz.question: __ ___ heyday
quiz.explanation: 全盛时期, 在其全盛时期. The empire was in its heyday during that century. 帝国在那个世纪处于其全盛时期。

quiz.question: ________ clay
quiz.explanation: 粘土; 泥土, 造型粘土. Children enjoy playing with modeling clay. 孩子们喜欢玩造型粘土。

quiz.question: allay _____
quiz.explanation: 减轻; 缓和, 减轻恐惧. The doctor tried to allay fears about the procedure. 医生试图减轻对手术的恐惧。

quiz.question: downplay ____
quiz.explanation: 轻描淡写; 低估, 低估风险. Officials tend to downplay risk to the public. 官员倾向于对公众低估风险。

quiz.question: underplay ____
quiz.explanation: 低估; 轻描淡写, 低估风险. Don't underplay risk in your analysis. 不要在你的分析中低估风险。

quiz.question: ______ interplay
quiz.explanation: 相互作用; 相互影响, 微妙的相互作用. There is a subtle interplay between the characters. 角色之间有微妙的相互作用。

quiz.question: waylay _ ________
quiz.explanation: 伏击; 拦路抢劫, 伏击旅行者. Bandits would waylay a traveler on the road. 强盗会在路上伏击旅行者。

quiz.question: defray _____
quiz.explanation: 支付; 负担费用, 支付费用. Sponsors will defray costs of the event. 赞助商将支付活动费用。

quiz.question: __ array __
quiz.explanation: 一系列; 排列, 一系列. The buffet offers an array of dishes. 自助餐提供一系列菜肴。

quiz.question: betray _ ______
quiz.explanation: 背叛; 泄露, 泄露秘密. Don't betray a secret that was told in confidence. 不要泄露私下告诉你的秘密。

quiz.question: portray _ ____
quiz.explanation: 描绘; 扮演, 扮演英雄. The actor will portray a hero in the film. 演员将在电影中扮演英雄。

quiz.question: stray ___
quiz.explanation: 走失的; 流浪的, 流浪狗. They rescued a stray dog from the street. 他们从街上救了一只流浪狗。

quiz.question: ______ gainsay
quiz.explanation: 否认; 反驳, 断然否认. He will flatly gainsay all accusations. 他将断然否认所有指控。

quiz.question: ____ hearsay
quiz.explanation: 传闻; 道听途说, 仅仅是传闻. The evidence is mere hearsay and inadmissible. 证据仅仅是传闻,不可采纳。

quiz.question: ___ __ assay
quiz.explanation: 化验; 分析, 进行化验. The lab will run an assay on the sample. 实验室将对样本进行化验。

quiz.question: naysay ________
quiz.explanation: 反对; 否定, 反对提案. Critics will naysay proposal without consideration. 批评者会不加考虑地反对提案。

quiz.question: _____ quay
quiz.explanation: 码头, 石码头. Ships dock at the stone quay. 船只停靠在石码头。

quiz.question: ____ stowaway
quiz.explanation: 偷渡者, 船上偷渡者. Security found a ship stowaway hidden below deck. 安全人员发现一名藏在甲板下的船上偷渡者。

quiz.question: ____ leeway
quiz.explanation: 余地; 自由, 给予余地. The manager will give leeway for creativity. 经理会给予创造性的余地。

quiz.question: _______ breezeway
quiz.explanation: 有顶过道, 有顶过道. A covered breezeway connects the buildings. 有顶过道连接这些建筑。

quiz.question: ________ gangway
quiz.explanation: 舷梯; 通道, 飞机舷梯. Passengers board via the aircraft gangway. 乘客通过飞机舷梯登机。

quiz.question: ____ efficacy
quiz.explanation: 功效; 效力, 药物功效. Clinical trials test drug efficacy. 临床试验测试药物功效。

quiz.question: delicacy ____
quiz.explanation: 美味; 精致, 美味拼盘. The delicacy tray featured exotic foods. 美味拼盘以异国食物为特色。

quiz.question: ______ intricacy
quiz.explanation: 复杂性; 错综复杂, 设计的复杂性. The design intricacy required skilled craftsmen. 设计的复杂性需要熟练的工匠。

quiz.question: ___-_______ advocacy
quiz.explanation: 拥护; 提倡, 枪支管制倡导. Gun-control advocacy groups lobbied legislators. 枪支管制倡导团体游说立法者。

quiz.question: ____________ candidacy
quiz.explanation: 候选资格, 总统候选资格. She announced her presidential candidacy yesterday. 她昨天宣布了她的总统候选资格。

quiz.question: _______ fallacy
quiz.explanation: 谬误; 谬论, 逻辑谬误. The argument contains a logical fallacy. 这个论点包含逻辑谬误。

quiz.question: ______ supremacy
quiz.explanation: 至高无上; 霸权, 全球霸权. Nations compete for global supremacy. 国家竞争全球霸权。

quiz.question: _________ contumacy
quiz.explanation: 抗命; 不服从, 政治抗命. The dissident showed political contumacy. 异见者表现出政治抗命。

quiz.question: _____ obstinacy
quiz.explanation: 固执; 顽固, 纯粹的固执. His sheer obstinacy prevented compromise. 他纯粹的固执阻止了妥协。

quiz.question: racy _____
quiz.explanation: 活泼的; 猥亵的, 猥亵的幽默. The comedian's racy humor offended some. 喜剧演员猥亵的幽默冒犯了一些人。

quiz.question: gynaecocracy ____
quiz.explanation: 女性统治, 女性统治. Gynaecocracy rule was rare in ancient times. 女性统治在古代很罕见。

quiz.question: _________ theocracy
quiz.explanation: 神权政治, 宗教神权政治. The religious theocracy controlled all aspects of life. 宗教神权政治控制了生活的方方面面。

quiz.question: gerontocracy ____
quiz.explanation: 老人统治, 老人统治. Gerontocracy rule dominated the society. 老人统治主导了社会。

quiz.question: ______ aristocracy
quiz.explanation: 贵族政治; 贵族阶层, 法国贵族. The French aristocracy was overthrown in revolution. 法国贵族在革命中被推翻。

quiz.question: ________ autocracy
quiz.explanation: 专制; 独裁, 绝对专制. The absolute autocracy suppressed all dissent. 绝对专制压制了所有异议。

quiz.question: _________ plutocracy
quiz.explanation: 富豪统治, 企业富豪统治. Critics fear a corporate plutocracy rules the nation. 批评者担心企业富豪统治统治着国家。

quiz.question: _______ bureaucracy
quiz.explanation: 官僚主义; 官僚机构, 臃肿的官僚机构. The bloated bureaucracy slows decision-making. 臃肿的官僚机构减慢了决策。

quiz.question: ________ confederacy
quiz.explanation: 邦联; 同盟, 南方邦联. The southern confederacy fought in the Civil War. 南方邦联在内战中作战。

quiz.question: ________ conspiracy
quiz.explanation: 阴谋; 共谋, 犯罪阴谋. The court uncovered a criminal conspiracy. 法院揭露了一起犯罪阴谋。

quiz.question: ________ accuracy
quiz.explanation: 准确性; 精确, 精确的准确性. The GPS provides pinpoint accuracy. GPS提供精确的准确性。

quiz.question: _______ prophecy
quiz.explanation: 预言, 实现预言. Events seemed to fulfill prophecy exactly. 事件似乎完全实现了预言。

quiz.question: _________ ascendancy
quiz.explanation: 优势; 支配地位, 政治优势. The party gained political ascendancy. 该党获得了政治优势。

quiz.question: _____ redundancy
quiz.explanation: 裁员; 冗余, 员工裁员. The company announced staff redundancy. 公司宣布了员工裁员。

quiz.question: ______ dormancy
quiz.explanation: 休眠; 静止, 冬季休眠. Plants enter winter dormancy to survive cold. 植物进入冬季休眠以度过寒冷。

quiz.question: ____ discrepancy
quiz.explanation: 差异; 不符, 数据差异. Researchers found a data discrepancy in results. 研究人员在结果中发现了数据差异。

quiz.question: _____ vibrancy
quiz.explanation: 活力; 生气, 城市活力. The neighborhood is known for its urban vibrancy. 该社区以其城市活力而闻名。

quiz.question: vagrancy ___
quiz.explanation: 流浪; 游荡, 流浪法. The vagrancy law was challenged in court. 流浪法在法庭上受到质疑。

quiz.question: _________ inconstancy
quiz.explanation: 不稳定; 易变, 情绪不稳定. His emotional inconstancy made relationships difficult. 他的情绪不稳定使关系变得困难。

quiz.question: truancy _______
quiz.explanation: 逃学, 逃学问题. Schools struggle with the truancy problem. 学校在逃学问题上挣扎。

quiz.question: _________ complacency
quiz.explanation: 自满; 满足, 危险的自满. Success can breed dangerous complacency. 成功会滋生危险的自满。

quiz.question: ______ decency
quiz.explanation: 正派; 体面, 普通礼节. Common decency requires basic courtesy. 普通礼节需要基本礼貌。

quiz.question: emergency ____
quiz.explanation: 紧急情况, 紧急出口. The emergency exit must remain clear. 紧急出口必须保持畅通。

quiz.question: ____ deficiency
quiz.explanation: 缺乏; 不足, 铁缺乏症. Iron deficiency causes anemia. 铁缺乏症导致贫血。

quiz.question: _________ expediency
quiz.explanation: 权宜之计, 政治权宜之计. The decision was based on political expediency. 该决定基于政治权宜之计。

quiz.question: ________ leniency
quiz.explanation: 宽大; 仁慈, 司法宽大. The defendant requested judicial leniency. 被告请求司法宽大。

quiz.question: _____ clemency
quiz.explanation: 宽恕; 仁慈, 给予宽恕. The governor will grant clemency to the prisoner. 州长将给予囚犯宽恕。

quiz.question: _______ consistency
quiz.explanation: 一致性; 连贯性, 逻辑一致性. The theory lacks logical consistency. 该理论缺乏逻辑一致性。

quiz.question: ________ delinquency
quiz.explanation: 违法; 拖欠, 青少年违法. The program aims to reduce juvenile delinquency. 该项目旨在减少青少年违法。

quiz.question: _________ insolvency
quiz.explanation: 无力偿还; 破产, 企业破产. Corporate insolvency rose during the recession. 企业破产在经济衰退期间上升。

quiz.question: ready ____
quiz.explanation: 准备好的; 现成的, 现金. The business needs ready cash for operations. 企业需要现金进行运营。

quiz.question: toady __ _____
quiz.explanation: 谄媚; 拍马屁, 向权力谄媚. He would toady to power to advance his career. 他会向权力谄媚以推进他的职业生涯。

quiz.question: _____ eddy
quiz.explanation: 漩涡, 水漩涡. The water eddy swirled near the rocks. 水漩涡在岩石附近旋转。

quiz.question: muddy _____
quiz.explanation: 泥泞的; 混浊的, 混浊的水. The river ran with muddy water after the rain. 雨后河水变得混浊。

quiz.question: needy ______
quiz.explanation: 贫困的; 需要帮助的, 贫困家庭. The charity helps needy family in the community. 慈善机构帮助社区中的贫困家庭。

quiz.question: reedy _____
quiz.explanation: 芦苇般的; 尖细的, 尖细的声音. The old man spoke in a reedy voice. 老人用尖细的声音说话。

quiz.question: _____ tragedy
quiz.explanation: 悲剧, 希腊悲剧. Greek tragedy explored human fate and suffering. 希腊悲剧探讨人类命运和苦难。

quiz.question: ___ __ perfidy
quiz.explanation: 背信弃义; 不忠, 背信弃义的行为. His betrayal was an act of perfidy. 他的背叛是背信弃义的行为。

quiz.question: _____ subsidy
quiz.explanation: 补贴; 津贴, 国家补贴. Farmers receive a state subsidy for crops. 农民获得农作物的国家补贴。

quiz.question: unwieldy _______
quiz.explanation: 笨重的; 难以处理的, 笨重的包裹. The unwieldy package was difficult to carry. 笨重的包裹很难搬运。

quiz.question: dandy ______
quiz.explanation: 花花公子; 极好的, 花花公子. The dandy fellow dressed impeccably. 花花公子穿着无可挑剔。

quiz.question: windy ______
quiz.explanation: 多风的; 冗长空洞的, 冗长空洞的演讲. The politician gave a windy speech full of platitudes. 政客发表了充满陈词滥调的冗长空洞演讲。

quiz.question: antibody ____
quiz.explanation: 抗体, 抗体测试. The antibody test detects immunity. 抗体测试检测免疫力。

quiz.question: embody ______
quiz.explanation: 体现; 包含, 体现理想. Heroes embody ideals we admire. 英雄体现了我们钦佩的理想。

quiz.question: moody ________
quiz.explanation: 喜怒无常的, 喜怒无常的青少年. The moody teenager refused to talk. 喜怒无常的青少年拒绝说话。

quiz.question: __ _ parody
quiz.explanation: 模仿作品; 滑稽模仿, 做滑稽模仿. The comedian will do a parody of the president. 喜剧演员将对总统做滑稽模仿。

quiz.question: _______ rhapsody
quiz.explanation: 狂想曲; 狂喜, 狂喜的狂想曲. The music put listeners in rapture rhapsody. 音乐使听众陷入狂喜的狂想曲。

quiz.question: ______ custody
quiz.explanation: 监护; 拘留, 警方拘留. The suspect is in police custody. 嫌疑人被警方拘留。

quiz.question: hardy _____
quiz.explanation: 耐寒的; 强壮的, 耐寒植物. This hardy plant survives harsh winters. 这种耐寒植物能在严冬中生存。

quiz.question: __ jeopardy
quiz.explanation: 危险, 处于危险中. The project is in jeopardy of cancellation. 该项目处于被取消的危险中。

quiz.question: tardy _____
quiz.explanation: 迟到的; 缓慢的, 迟来的回复. His tardy reply arrived too late. 他迟来的回复来得太晚了。

quiz.question: sturdy _____
quiz.explanation: 结实的; 坚固的, 坚固的框架. The chair has a sturdy frame. 椅子有坚固的框架。

quiz.question: _____ understudy
quiz.explanation: 替角; 替补演员, 舞台替补演员. The stage understudy learned all the lines. 舞台替补演员学会了所有台词。

quiz.question: bawdy ____
quiz.explanation: 粗俗的; 下流的, 粗俗的笑话. He told a bawdy joke that embarrassed everyone. 他讲了一个粗俗的笑话,让每个人都感到尴尬。

quiz.question: dowdy _____
quiz.explanation: 过时的; 寒酸的, 寒酸的衣服. She wore a dowdy dress to the party. 她穿着寒酸的衣服去参加聚会。

quiz.question: off-key ____
quiz.explanation: 走调的; 不合适的, 走调的音符. The singer hit an off-key note. 歌手唱了一个走调的音符。

quiz.question: _______ lackey
quiz.explanation: 仆从; 走狗, 奴性的走狗. The servile lackey obeyed every command. 奴性的走狗服从每一个命令。

quiz.question: jockey ___ ________
quiz.explanation: 骑师; 争取, 争取位置. Politicians jockey for position before elections. 政客在选举前争取位置。

quiz.question: _ medley __ _____
quiz.explanation: 混合曲; 杂录, 混合曲调. The band played a medley of tunes. 乐队演奏了混合曲调。

quiz.question: galley _______
quiz.explanation: 船上厨房; 单层甲板大帆船, 船上厨房. The boat has a compact galley kitchen. 船上有一个紧凑的厨房。

quiz.question: ____ pulley
quiz.explanation: 滑轮, 绳索滑轮. The rope pulley lifts heavy loads easily. 绳索滑轮轻松提升重物。

quiz.question: ____ parley
quiz.explanation: 会谈; 谈判, 举行会谈. The leaders will hold parley to discuss peace. 领导人将举行会谈讨论和平。
